items.label: ALL ON disabled/ ALL OFF disabled
ALL ON disabled/ ALL OFF active
ALL ON active / ALL OFF disabled
ALL ON active / ALL OFF active

values.help:
Auto off relay after specified time, with the possibility of manual override - immediate Off after button push.
      Default value: 0 Manual override disabled
values.label: Auto off relay after specified time

items.label: Manual override disabled
Manual override enabled

values.help: Automatic turning off relay 1 after set time, (0-255) in 10ms increments for FW1.0 to FW2.0, (0-65535) in 100 ms increment for FW2.1+
values.label: Relay 1: OFF-delay time

values.help: Automatic turning off relay 2 after set time, (0-255) in 10ms increments for FW1.0 to FW2.0, (0-65535) in 100 ms increment for FW2.1+
values.label: Relay 2: OFF-delay time

values.help: Correct working parameter No. 6 requires settings parameter No. 15 to 1. This activates functionality double-click - Control Dimmer/Roller Shutter. Default setting: 0
values.label: Managing the transmission of control commands to the devices from first group of associations (key 1).

items.label: The control commands are sent when the device is turned on and off (default)

The control commands are sent when the device is turned off. Enabling the device does not send commands controls. Double click on key 1 will send ON to all devices in group 1, all dimmers set to prev.value (ex. 50%)
The control commands are sent when the device is turned off. Enabling the device does not send commands controls. Double click on key 1 will send ON to all devices in group 1, all dimmers set to 100%

values.help: Correct working parameter No. 6 requires settings parameter No. 15 to 1. This activates functionality double-click - Control Dimmer/Roller Shutter. Default setting: 0
values.label: Managing the transmission of control commands to the devices from second group of associations (key 2).

items.label: The control commands are sent when the device is turned on and off (default)

The control commands are sent when the device is turned off. Enabling the device does not send commands controls. Double click on key 2 will send ON to all devices in group 2, all dimmers set to prev.value (ex. 50%)
The control commands are sent when the device is turned off. Enabling the device does not send commands controls. Double click on key 2 will send ON to all devices in group 2, all dimmers set to 100%

values.help: In case of bi-stable switches, define their behaviour (toggle or follow). Default setting: 0
values.label: Inputs behaviour

items.label: Toggle
Follow switch contact (closed=ON, open=OFF)

values.help: Binary inputs type configuration. Default setting: 1
values.label: Inputs Button/Switch configuration

items.label: Mono-stable input (button)
Bi-stable input (switch)

values.help:
Enable/Disable operation of dimmer or roller shutter devices associated to group 1.
        Available only when using mono-stable inputs (buttons) - Hold button 1 or double-tap for operation (only mono-stable input (button)). Default setting: 0
values.label: Dimmer/Roller shutter control

items.label: Disable Dimmer/Roller shutter control
Enable Dimmer/Roller shutter control

values.help: Saving state before power failure. Default setting: 1
values.label: Saving state before power failure

items.label: State NOT saved at power failure, all outputs are set to OFF upon power restore
State saved at power failure, all outputs are set to previous state upon power restore
DEACTIVATION - no response to alarm frames
ALARM RELAY ON - relay will turn ON upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM RELAY OFF - relay will turn OFF upon receipt of alarm frame
ALARM FLASHING - relay will turn ON and OFF periodically (see param.39)
